description: Disaster Risk Reduction at the National Level in Nepal - Phase II (NEP/07/012)

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description: This project is a follow-up of DRRNLN - Phase I. The project includes 3 key activities: a) implementation of National Strategy for Disaster Risk Management, b) partnership and support to Disaster Preparedness Network in Nepal, and c) mass media campaign for general public awarenss.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
